thread.title: Ground News - Surveillance video shows moment truck crashes into Palm Harbor hair salon
thread.title_full: Ground News - Surveillance video shows moment truck crashes into Palm Harbor hair salon

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Surveillance video shows moment truck crashes into Palm Harbor hair salon
text:
Summary by Ground News A Ford F-150 crashed into a Palm Harbor hair salon on Wednesday. The driver, a 76-year-old Tarpon Springs man, accidentally accelerated and lost control of the vehicle. Video shows the man's truck traveling forward before striking the building. No one was taken to the hospital. Share menu More

WFLA-TV Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Surveillance video shows moment truck crashes into Palm Harbor hair salon PALM HARBOR, Fla. (WFLA) -- Newly released surveillance video shows the moment a Ford F-150 crashed into a Palm Harbor hair salon on Wednesday. According to the Florida Highway Patrol, the crash happened around 3:47 p.m. in the parking lot of 683 Alderman Road when the driver, a 76-year-old Tarpon Springs man, accidentally accelerated and lost control of the vehicle. ‘Sick attempt to terrorize my family’: Sen.
